code: import React from'react';import{Drawer,Box,Typography,Divider,List,ListItem,ListItemIcon,ListItemText}from'@mui/material';import{Dashboard as DashboardIcon,Assignment as TaskIcon,Category as CategoryIcon,Settings as SettingsIcon}from'@mui/icons-material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavigationDrawer=_ref=>{let{open,currentView,onClose,onViewChange}=_ref;const handleViewChange=view=>{onViewChange(view);onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Drawer,{anchor:"left",open:open,onClose:onClose,sx:{'& .MuiDrawer-paper':{width:280}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{p:2},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"primary",children:"\uD83D\uDCDD Task Manager"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(List,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{button:true,selected:currentView==='dashboard',onClick:()=>handleViewChange('dashboard'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:"Dashboard"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{button:true,selected:currentView==='tasks',onClick:()=>handleViewChange('tasks'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:"Tareas"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{button:true,selected:currentView==='categories',onClick:()=>handleViewChange('categories'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:"Categor\xEDas"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{button:true,selected:currentView==='settings',onClick:()=>handleViewChange('settings'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SettingsIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:"Configuraci\xF3n"})]})]})]});};export default NavigationDrawer;
